sentences.en: A silver bracelet with some intricate scrollwork . clung to his right wrist.
sentences.cn: 右腕有一只花纹细致的银手镯.

sentences.en: Although the problem is intricate and complex, it can be solved very quickly with an electronic computer.
sentences.cn: 这道题虽然错综复杂, 但用电子计算机很快就能解出.

sentences.en: an intricate network of loyalties and relationships
sentences.cn: 忠诚与义气构成的盘根错节的网络

sentences.en: He knows his way around the intricate maze of European law.
sentences.cn: 他通晓错综复杂的欧洲律法。

sentences.en: Her washing machine tends to fray edges on intricate designs.
sentences.cn: 她的洗衣机经常会把织物上的一些复杂图案的边缘磨坏。

sentences.en: His new play, Arcadia, is as intricate, elaborate and allusive as anything he has yet written.
sentences.cn: 他的新剧《阿卡迪亚》和他写过的任何作品一样，错综复杂、构思精巧并且富含典故。

sentences.en: I have a novel with an intricate plot.
sentences.cn: 我有一本情节错综复杂的小说.

sentences.en: The building has intricate geometrical designs on several of the walls.
sentences.cn: 建筑物的几面墙上有复杂的几何图案.

sentences.en: The child was perplexed by the intricate plot of the story.
sentences.cn: 这孩子被那头绪纷繁的故事弄得迷惑不解.
这个设计是错综复杂的.

sentences.en: The plot is intricate and full of interest.
The plot of the novel is intricate and fascinating.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的情节错综复杂,引人入胜.

sentences.en: The quilt has pretty, scalloped edges and intricate quilting.
sentences.cn: 这条被子有漂亮的荷叶饰边，而且绗缝活做得也很精致。

sentences.en: We were able to thread but slowly through the intricate reports.
sentences.cn: 我们能弄懂这些复杂的报告,只是很慢.

trans.tran_cn: 错综复杂的，难理解的，曲折，盘错
trans.tran_en: containing many small parts or details that all work or fit together
